summary.para: Called to send notifications when the picture that represents a user account is changed.

param.name: pszUserName
param.para: Pointer to a string that contains the user name. Set this parameter to NULL to specify the current user.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: When the picture that represents a user account changes, the callback object notifies all applications that are registered under this registry subkey:

summary.para: Exposes a method which is called when the picture that represents a user account is changed.

remarks.para: Applications that want to notify users through this interface can add their class identifier (CLSID) strings as values under this key:
